word: FOR A PERIOD OF ABOUT TEN YEARS, BEGINNING WITH 1898, THE LORD SENT THROUGH HIS SERVANT MANY MESSAGES OF ENCOURAGEMENT, INSTRUCTION, COUNSEL, AND WARNING REGARDING THIS WORK. IN 1902 TESTIMONIES FOR THE CHURCH VOLUME VII APPEARED, IN WHICH WAS INCLUDED A SECTION ON THE HEALTH FOOD WORK. THIS SECTION DEALS COMPREHENSIVELY WITH THE PRINCIPLES THAT WERE OUTLINED PREVIOUS TO THAT TIME.
